sentence.Network_en: He had spilled catsup on his shirtfront.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的衬衫胸部部分溅有番茄酱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... Harry攥着Draco衬衣的手握成了拳，然后把他拽了起来，他们两个面对面的，简直就要脸贴着脸了。3. shirtfront n. 衬衫的胸部更多

means.word_mean: 1. the front of a shirt (usually the part not covered by a jacket);

sentences.sentence: "he had spilled catsup on his shirtfront"

means.word_mean: 2. a man's detachable insert (usually starched) to simulate the front of a shirt

auth_sentence.content: He'd tucked a corner of his napkin into his shirtfront, like a little boy.
